title: Reasons why league is bad
body: LEAGUE IS LEGIT THE WORST FUCKING GAME IVE EVER PLAYED, ITS DUMB, UNFAIR AND LEGIT JUST FUCKING CANCER, NO ITS WORSE THAN CANCER ITS LIKE HITLER AND KIM JON UNG AND ISIS HAD A WEIRD ORGI AND BIRTHED THE ANTI-CHRIST, LEAGUE IS THAT BAD.
